rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0001
rows.name:
I suppose we've you to thank for the
Merc Group's tremendous growth.

rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Now we've got a rock-solid foundation,
it might be a good time to try staging
mock battles with other groups.

rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, we're not going to get anywhere
with just bodybuilding and practice
swings at the training ground, are we?

rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0004
rows.name:
No, I think it's a good opportunity to
put ourselves to the test and see how
we measure up to the rest!

rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0006
rows.name:
It so happens we've got one such
individual lined up for you to fight
already. Well? What do you say?

rows.label: tlk45300143_06_msg0007
rows.name:
Needless to say, this match is the real
deal, so you better give it your all out
there, you hear?
